summary: Request to implement a remote codec converter for TypeScript SDK, equivalent to the Go SDK's NewRemoteDataConverter functionality for encoding/decoding workflow data.
userImpact: Users cannot use remote codec converters in TypeScript SDK, limiting their ability to implement centralized encoding/decoding strategies.
proposedFix: Implement RemoteDataConverter equivalent matching Go SDK's NewRemoteDataConverter API and functionality.
keyQuote: Add the equivalent of `NewRemoteDataConverter` in Go
